name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - M | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Telescope Words consist of three clues.  The first clue is the longest word, which begins with an "M" in this quiz.  The second clue will drop the "M", and the final clue drops the first letter yet again.  For instance, if the clues read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid", the answer would be "Drink - Rink - Ink".  However, I only want the longest word, so in this case you would type in "drink" only.  Got it?  Good luck.
